title: Die Morder sind unter uns (1946) (Murderers are among us)
description: Susanne Wallner returns to the ruins of Berlin from a Concentration Camp after WW2 to discover that someone else lives in her apartment: Dr. Hans Mertens, the war made him depressive and he drinks a lot of alcohol. Susanne asks him to go but he doesn't want to, so they share Susanne's apartment and even discover their sympathy and then their love for each other. That encourages him a little, of course. But then he hears that Ferdinand BrÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¼ckner is still alive and also lives in Berlin.
